name: Complete Twitter Solution
author: Audacio Tech IT

sections.description:
Complete Twitter Solution can display your twitter feeds along with the faces of people who liked your twitter profile on your website.

Features:

With our module even if you just want to display your twitter followers or only twitter feed – you can!

Advanced configuration options make it more worthy.

Background color, Border radius, Border color, Header Text, Header Background, Header Font Color, Connections limit & many more can be edit just from your backend options.

Can display or hide – Faces, Feeds, Header & Footer from backend options.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. go to Widgets page and Enjoy our Plugin.

Options Panel:

  1. Module Suffix: CSS Class suffix put here

  2. Twitter USERNAME: your twitter username

  3. Width: Width of your module in pixel.

  4. Twitter Configuration Keys:

Four Twitter Configuration keys you have to create: how to – pls follow:::

a. go here – https://apps.twitter.com/

b. click – “Create new app” button on top right – after the header area

c. Put all information. keep callback url – empty – sign all agreements then click on “Create New Application” button on bottom.

d. Now you’ll get – “Consumer Key & Secret”

Still have to find Access token & Access token secret.

e. on next page – Click on button to create access tokens. that will give your access tokens.

  1. Show Faces: You can hide followers by selecting “No”

  2. Show Feeds: You can hide twitter feeds by selecting “No”

  3. Rest of options are simple customization – Keep playing!!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. go to Widgets page and Enjoy our Plugin.

Options Panel:

  1. Module Suffix: CSS Class suffix put here

  2. Twitter USERNAME: your twitter username

  3. Width: Width of your module in pixel.

  4. Twitter Configuration Keys:

Four Twitter Configuration keys you have to create: how to – pls follow:::

a. go here – https://apps.twitter.com/

b. click – “Create new app” button on top right – after the header area

c. Put all information. keep callback url – empty – sign all agreements then click on “Create New Application” button on bottom.

d. Now you’ll get – “Consumer Key & Secret”

Still have to find Access token & Access token secret.

e. on next page – Click on button to create access tokens. that will give your access tokens.

  1. Show Faces: You can hide followers by selecting “No”

  2. Show Feeds: You can hide twitter feeds by selecting “No”

  3. Rest of options are simple customization – Keep playing!!

Can I see any demo of the widget plugin?

http://audaciotech.com/wordpress/documentation/

If I need any support can I ask?

Yep sure!! you can email us in – audaciotechit@outlook.com
